ModMetaData.name: LMC059s.远征便携式装备
ModMetaData.author: Thom Blair III
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Provides lightweight, portable gear specially designed for caravans and camping. 提供专为远征和野营设计的便携装备。 Caravan Chair: - Prevents the "Uncomfortable (need something soft to sit on)" mood while on caravans - Weight: 1kg - Research requirement: Complex furniture 便携式休息椅： -在远征时防止“不舒服（需要柔软的东西坐着）”的情绪 -重量：1KG -科技要求：复杂家具 Caravan Table: - Prevents the "Ate without a table" mood while on caravans - Size: 1x1 - Seats 4 people - Weight: 2kg - Research requirement: Complex furniture 便携式餐桌 -防止在远征时“没有桌子可用于进餐”的情绪 -尺寸：1x1 -可以供4人使用 -重量：2KG -科技要求：复杂家具 Caravan Chemfuel Stove: - Holds 3 chemfuel - Can cook any type of meal - Size: 1x1 - Weight: 1kg 便携式燃炉 -可装载3个化合燃料 -可以烹饪任何类型的食物 -尺寸：1x1 -重量：1KG Caravan Lantern: - Powered by chemfuel - 3 chemfuel provides 1.4 days of runtime - Can be switched on and off - Weight: 0.5kg 便携式照明灯 -由化合燃料提供动力 -3单位化合燃料提供1.4天的运行时间 -可以手动开关 -重量：0.5KG Caravan Biofuel Refinery: - Produces chemfuel from wood, raw food, and plant matter - Approximately 2 organic matter yields 1 chemfuel - Weight: 1kg - Research requirement: Electricity and Biofuel refining 便携式精炼厂 -用木材、生食和植物生产化合燃料 -大约2单位有机物产生1单位化合燃料 -重量：1KG -科技要求：电力和燃料精炼 Caravan Generator: - Powered by chemfuel - Generates 500W - 5 chemfuel provides 2.5 days of runtime - Weight: 2.5kg - Research requirement: Electricity 便携式发电机 -产生500W功率 -5单位化合燃料提供2.5天的运行时间 -重量：2.5KG -科技要求：电力 Fully save compatible. Please report any errors.
